name: v0.4.0
body:
## Using Bzlmod with Bazel >=6

1. Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_zig", version = "0.4.0")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE.bazel` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "rules_zig",
    sha256 = "b4e95afef292b8fe00cd2a4272176e1cb466138dc7ab370a4ed752c653420b25",
    strip_prefix = "rules_zig-0.4.0",
    url = "https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/releases/download/v0.4.0/rules_zig-0.4.0.tar.gz",
)

###################
# rules_zig setup #
###################
# Fetches the rules_zig dependencies.
# If you want to have a different version of some dependency,
# you should fetch it *before* calling this.
# Alternatively, you can skip calling this function, so long as you've
# already fetched all the dependencies.
load("@rules_zig//zig:repositories.bzl", "rules_zig_dependencies", "zig_register_toolchains")

rules_zig_dependencies()

zig_register_toolchains(
    name = "zig",
    zig_versions = [
        "0.12.0",
        "0.11.0",
    ],
)
```

## Highlights
* Support for Zig SDK versions 0.12.0 and 0.11.0.
* Support for builds involving multiple Zig SDK versions via transition on the `--@zig_toolchains//:version` flag.

## Breaking Changes
* The zig module extension no longer accepts a name attr.

## What's Changed
* chore: refactor ZigModuleInfo by @aherrmann in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/233
* chore(deps): update dependency rules_multirun to v0.7.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/235
* [chore] track Zig SDK version by @aherrmann in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/236
* chore(deps): update dependency aspect_bazel_lib to v2.4.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/234
* chore(deps): update dependency aspect_bazel_lib to v2.5.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/237
* chore(deps): update dependency rules_multirun to v0.8.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/238
* chore(deps): update dependency aspect_bazel_lib to v2.5.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/239
* chore(deps): update softprops/action-gh-release action to v2 by @renovate in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/241
* chore(deps): update dependency bazel to v7.1.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/242
* chore(deps): update dependency aspect_bazel_lib to v2.5.3 by @renovate in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/240
* chore(deps): update dependency platforms to v0.0.9 by @renovate in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/244
* chore(deps): update dependency bazel to v7.1.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/243
* chore(deps): update dependency rules_multirun to v0.9.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/245
* chore: use `json.encode` instead of struct method. by @aherrmann in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/246
* chore(deps): update dependency cgrindel_bazel_starlib to v0.20.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/247
* chore(deps): update dependency aspect_bazel_lib to v2.6.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/248
* chore(deps): update dependency aspect_bazel_lib to v2.6.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/249
* chore(deps): update dependency gazelle to v0.36.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/251
* chore(deps): update dependency bazel_gazelle to v0.36.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/250
* chore(deps): update dependency aspect_bazel_lib to v2.7.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/252
* feat: external and persisted Zig cache by @aherrmann in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/253
* docs: generate stardocs for module extensions by @aherrmann in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/256
* feat!: support multiple Zig SDK versions by @aherrmann in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/258
* feat: support Zig version transion by @aherrmann in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/260
* feat: sort specified Zig SDK versions by semantic version by @aherrmann in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/261
* feat: implicit default Zig SDK version by @aherrmann in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/262
* feat: root module can specify default Zig version by @aherrmann in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/263
* docs: update zig module extension documentation by @aherrmann in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/264
* chore: trigger CI on base branch change by @aherrmann in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/265
* test: Zig version tests use version build flag by @aherrmann in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/266
* feat: generate config settings for version ranges by @aherrmann in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/268
* chore(deps): update dependency aspect_bazel_lib to v2.7.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/269
* test: add unit tests for zig module extension by @aherrmann in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/270
* chore(deps): update dependency io_bazel_rules_go to v0.47.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/272
* feat: support Zig versions 0.11.0 and 0.12.0 by @github-actions in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/271
* fix: dynamic linking on MacOS with Zig 0.12.0 by @aherrmann in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/275
* test: re-enable Zig docs generation for Zig 0.12.0 on MaCOS by @aherrmann in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/276


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/compare/v0.3.0...v0.4.0

name: v0.3.0
body:
## Using Bzlmod with Bazel >=6

1. Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_zig", version = "0.3.0")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE.bazel` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "rules_zig",
    sha256 = "74edce4778a885eeea159c11c335ed412a913c24b9d701e590a42c34aa48b3c8",
    strip_prefix = "rules_zig-0.3.0",
    url = "https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/releases/download/v0.3.0/rules_zig-0.3.0.tar.gz",
)

###################
# rules_zig setup #
###################
# Fetches the rules_zig dependencies.
# If you want to have a different version of some dependency,
# you should fetch it *before* calling this.
# Alternatively, you can skip calling this function, so long as you've
# already fetched all the dependencies.
load("@rules_zig//zig:repositories.bzl", "rules_zig_dependencies", "zig_register_toolchains")

rules_zig_dependencies()

zig_register_toolchains(
    name = "zig",
    zig_version = "0.11.0",
)
```


## What's Changed
* chore(deps): update dependency io_bazel_rules_go to v0.44.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/186
* chore(deps): update dependency rules_bazel_integration_test to v0.21.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/188
* chore(deps): update dependency rules_bazel_integration_test to v0.21.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/189
* chore(deps): update dependency rules_python to v0.28.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/190
* chore(deps): update dependency rules_python to v0.28.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/191
* chore(deps): update dependency aspect_bazel_lib to v2.2.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/187
* chore(deps): update dependency aspect_bazel_lib to v2.3.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/192
* chore(deps): update dependency io_bazel_rules_go to v0.45.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/193
* chore(deps): update dependency rules_bazel_integration_test to v0.22.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/194
* chore(deps): update actions/cache action to v4 by @renovate in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/195
* chore(deps): update dependency bazel to v7.0.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/196
* chore(deps): update dependency io_bazel_rules_go to v0.45.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/197
* chore(deps): update dependency rules_bazel_integration_test to v0.23.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/198
* chore(deps): update dependency rules_bazel_integration_test to v0.23.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/199
* chore(deps): update dependency rules_python to v0.29.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/200
* chore(deps): update dependency rules_python to v0.29.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/201
* chore(deps): update dependency bazel to v7.0.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/202
* chore(deps): update andstor/file-existence-action action to v3 by @renovate in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/203
* feat: add `env` and `env_inherit` attributes by @aherrmann in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/204
* chore: reproducible update_deleted_packages by @aherrmann in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/205
* feat: minimal runfiles library (no manifest, no repo-mapping) by @aherrmann in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/206
* feat: implement runfiles repo-mapping (only from main repo so far) by @aherrmann in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/208
* chore(deps): update dependency rules_zig to v0.2.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/209
* feat: support source relative repo mapping by @aherrmann in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/210
* feat: implicit bazel_builtin package dependency by @aherrmann in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/211
* feat: remove zig_runfiles in favor of bazel_builtin by @aherrmann in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/212
* chore(deps): update dependency aspect_bazel_lib to v2.4.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/213
* feat: support manifest based runfiles lookup by @aherrmann in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/214
* feat: non-allocating variant of rlocation by @aherrmann in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/215
* chore(deps): update dependency io_bazel_rules_go to v0.46.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/216
* feat: expose runfiles environment variables by @aherrmann in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/217
* feat: validate rlocation path by @aherrmann in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/218
* chore: explicit error unions by @aherrmann in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/219
* chore(deps): update dependency rules_python by @renovate in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/220
* chore(deps): update dependency rules_python to v0.31.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/222
* feat: support zig documentation generation by @aherrmann in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/223
* fix: resolve zig-autodoc-guide correctly by @aherrmann in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/224
* docs: runfiles library user guide by @aherrmann in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/225
* feat: use libc without cc-toolchain by @aherrmann in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/226
* feat: introduce Runfiles.withSourceRepo by @aherrmann in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/227
* chore: rename zig_package to zig_module by @aherrmann in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/228
* chore: BCR presubmit - set Bazel versions by @aherrmann in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/229


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/compare/v0.2.0...v0.3.0

name: v0.2.0
body:
## Using Bzlmod with Bazel >=6

1. Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_zig", version = "0.2.0")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE.bazel` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "rules_zig",
    sha256 = "df01689593b39960cf67a9ca964e986b76e5d16b7548c45f84f0b5ad221050a7",
    strip_prefix = "rules_zig-0.2.0",
    url = "https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/releases/download/v0.2.0/rules_zig-0.2.0.tar.gz",

###################
# rules_zig setup #
###################
# Fetches the rules_zig dependencies.
# If you want to have a different version of some dependency,
# you should fetch it *before* calling this.
# Alternatively, you can skip calling this function, so long as you've
# already fetched all the dependencies.
load("@rules_zig//zig:repositories.bzl", "rules_zig_dependencies", "zig_register_toolchains")

rules_zig_dependencies()

zig_register_toolchains(
    name = "zig",
    zig_version = "0.11.0",
)
```


## What's Changed
* chore(deps): update dependency rules_python to v0.27.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/145
* chore(deps): update dependency rules_python to v0.27.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/147
* chore(deps): update dependency aspect_bazel_lib to v2.0.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/149
* chore(deps): update dependency aspect_bazel_lib to v2.0.3 by @renovate in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/150
* chore(deps): update dependency aspect_bazel_lib to v2.0.3 by @renovate in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/151
* fix: Zig update - don't require requests by @aherrmann in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/152
* chore(deps): update dependency buildifier_prebuilt to v6.4.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/153
* chore(deps): update dependency buildifier_prebuilt to v6.4.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/154
* chore(deps): update dependency cgrindel_bazel_starlib to v0.19.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/155
* chore(deps): update dependency io_bazel_rules_go to v0.44.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/156
* chore(deps): update dependency bazel_gazelle to v0.35.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/157
* chore(deps): update dependency gazelle to v0.35.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/158
* chore(deps): update dependency aspect_bazel_lib to v2.1.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/159
* chore(deps): update dependency aspect_bazel_lib to v2.1.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/160
* feat: Support linking against static libraries by @aherrmann in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/163
* test: static library linking behavior by @aherrmann in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/166
* feat: Support C header imports by @aherrmann in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/167
* feat: Enable libc/libc++ linking to expose system headers by @aherrmann in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/168
* feat: Support ABI selection and transition by @aherrmann in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/169
* chore(deps): update dependency io_bazel_rules_go to v0.44.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/170
* fix: correctly forward defines on cc_library cdeps by @aherrmann in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/171
* fix: construct isystem arguments correctly by @aherrmann in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/175
* chore: Update to Bazel version 7.0.0 by @aherrmann in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/177
* feat: Support custom dynamic linker by @aherrmann in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/176
* feat: Support linking against shared libraries by @aherrmann in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/165
* fix: collect cdeps data dependencies by @aherrmann in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/183
* feat: support location and make variable expansion by @aherrmann in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/184
* chore(deps): update dependency aspect_bazel_lib to v2.1.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/185


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/compare/v0.1.0...v0.2.0

name: v0.1.0
body:
## Using Bzlmod with Bazel >=6

1. Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_zig", version = "0.1.0")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE.bazel` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "rules_zig",
    sha256 = "6ccc0cf61ae1a1f3e61aa2c2721309692f6b8cd8e18206e8c0dcd6423dfd101d",
    strip_prefix = "rules_zig-0.1.0",
    url = "https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/releases/download/v0.1.0/rules_zig-0.1.0.tar.gz",
)

###################
# rules_zig setup #
###################
# Fetches the rules_zig dependencies.
# If you want to have a different version of some dependency,
# you should fetch it *before* calling this.
# Alternatively, you can skip calling this function, so long as you've
# already fetched all the dependencies.
load("@rules_zig//zig:repositories.bzl", "rules_zig_dependencies", "zig_register_toolchains")

rules_zig_dependencies()

zig_register_toolchains(
    name = "zig",
    zig_version = "0.11.0",
)
```


## What's Changed
* feat: download and register Zig release 0.10.1 for Linux by @aherrmann in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/3
* feat: zig_binary rule for single Zig source file binary by @aherrmann in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/5
* feat: support multiple Zig sources in zig_binary rule by @aherrmann in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/7
* feat: add zig_package rule and support Zig packages deps in zig_binary rule by @aherrmann in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/10
* feat: add deps attribute to zig_package rule by @aherrmann in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/12
* feat: add zig_library rule by @aherrmann in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/17
* feat: add zig_test rule by @aherrmann in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/20
* chore: apply updates from bazel-contrib/rules-template by @aherrmann in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/22
* chore: apply pre-commit fixes to all files by @aherrmann in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/24
* test: define bazel-in-bazel integration tests by @aherrmann in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/25
* refactor: deduplicate the list of supported Bazel versions for integration tests by @aherrmann in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/28
* ci: test that generated files are up-to-date by @aherrmann in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/29
* test: add integration tests for the zig_test rule by @aherrmann in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/30
* feat: download and register Zig release 0.10.1 for MacOS (amd64) by @aherrmann in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/31
* feat: support Zig build modes by @aherrmann in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/35
* ci: optimize the CI configuration by @aherrmann in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/36
* feat: add the zig_configure* rule family to support transitioning on the Zig build mode by @aherrmann in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/41
* ci: disable MacOS CI (temporarily) by @aherrmann in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/42
* feat: add a build setting to control target binary threaded-ness by @aherrmann in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/45
* feat: add a linker_script attribute to the Zig build rules by @aherrmann in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/47
* feat: support cross-compilation via Bazel's platforms & toolchains by @aherrmann in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/50
* feat: support target platform transitions in the zig_configure* rule family by @aherrmann in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/53
* docs: fill in the README with a minimal description by @aherrmann in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/60
* chore: fill in the LICENSE template by @aherrmann in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/61
* docs: expand the API documentation by @aherrmann in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/62
* docs: add a motivation section to the README by @aherrmann in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/67
* chore: configure release automation by @aherrmann in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/68
* chore: cherry-pick bazel-contrib/rules-template updates by @aherrmann in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/69
* feat: add bzlmod support by @aherrmann in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/73
* fix: update filename in release prep script by @aherrmann in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/74
* feat: add support for MacOS by @aherrmann in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/75
* fix: avoid output_base path in build outputs by @aherrmann in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/78
* feat: support C source files in Zig rules by @aherrmann in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/91
* fix: root source file in progress message by @aherrmann in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/92
* feat: extra_srcs attribute to support `@embedFile` by @aherrmann in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/94
* feat: support the x86_32-linux target platform by @aherrmann in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/95
* feat: support the ppc-linux target platform by @aherrmann in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/96
* chore: factor out common rule implementation by @aherrmann in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/97
* feat: add data attributes to Zig rules by @aherrmann in https://github.com/aherrmann/rules_zig/pull/98
